targets.query: from(bucket: "qos_metrics") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "throughput") |> group(columns: ["service_name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> mean()
